title: 'Everyone needs their own thermometer': A warning from a UK doctor who got COVID-19
description: Having just returned to work after spending time in isolation with coronavirus, a London-based cardiologist says the government has been too slow to react to the danger signs of the outbreak. And that the initial aim for herd immunity was in his view an attem…
content:
Updated 
April 02, 2020 16:19:55
When London-based cardiologist Dr Mark Gallagher left work just over a fortnight ago with a 37.9 degrees Celsius fever, he tested himself for COVID-19 straight away.
Dr Gallagher had a strong view he had been infected, and … [+3787 chars]
